name: MoonQuest (itch) (applesmash)
description:
Young Shibu must get to the moon. But as all HODLers know, its not as simple as it seems and can be quite the journey.

This is a proof of concept adventure game taking our Doge hero, Young Shiba on an epic journey through many places. The prototype covers 3 small levels. I have a skeleton of a story written. 

Depending on donations, I will bring on help to make a more refined character, character controller,  enemies, combat system, higher end graphics, large open maps, and inventory system.

Tips Welcome:
Doge: DRrXycSZPyoUk49qJcaU74oUxHnVAHsoMK

I am open to partnerships.
